title: Leftover XP Boost
body: So I have 27 wins left on my XP boost and i just hit level 30. Is there a way I can get Riot to convert to an IP boost or a bit of RP or something?

replies.body:
I'm not sure about converting it to RP.. but we may be able to work something out if you reach us in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Whoa there, what about those of us that used to have them back a few seasons ago and were told too bad? Has this changed?

I don't know what the policy was a few seasons ago, but as far as I can recall, we've been helping with these for a while.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
